author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Beijing Shunxin Agriculture's 2017 Net Profit Up, Plans Medium-Term Notes Issue
text:
March 30 (Reuters) - Beijing Shunxin Agriculture Co Ltd :
* SAYS 2017 NET PROFIT UP 6.3 PERCENT Y/Y AT 438.4 MILLION YUAN ($69.88 million)
* SAYS IT PLANS TO ISSUE UP TO 3.0 BILLION YUAN MEDIUM-TERM NOTES Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2uy95IL ; bit.ly/2GYztOK ; bit.ly/2IgwIru Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.2732 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
